SELECT comment_num, content, TO_CHAR(reg_date,'MM-DD HH24:MI') reg_date, post_num, id, anonymous, mem_num FROM (SELECT a.*, rownum rnum FROM (SELECT comment_num, content, f.reg_date, post_num, id, anonymous, f.mem_num FROM freeboard_comment f JOIN member m ON f.mem_num=m.mem_num JOIN member_detail d ON m.mem_num=d.mem_num WHERE post_num = #{post_num} ORDER BY comment_num DESC)a)
WHERE rnum >= #{start} AND rnum <= #{end}
